title: Full Stack Developer (.NET | Angular | Azure)
summary: Full Stack Developer with 5.8+ years of experience building secure, scalable, and cloud-native applications using .NET Core, Angular, Azure, SQL, and microservices. I specialize in high-performance APIs, distributed systems, and clean architecture, and have a strong track record of delivering production-ready software in real-world environments. I enjoy solving complex problems, optimizing performance, and creating solutions that are reliable, maintainable, and designed to scale.
